title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 674.9 - Official notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 674.9 - Official notice

State Regulations

The ALJ may take official notice of a fact not subject to
reasonable dispute if it is either generally known or can be accurately or
readily verified in generally acceptable references prior to or following the
close of the hearing record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
674.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
